data.title: Best Little Chinese restuarant in League City
data.text: I have been going to this chinese drive-thru for over 20 years.  It is family owned and I have watched the daughter grow from little to adulthood.  The food is some of the best for the price.  My very favorite is the Hot and Sour Soup, I usually stop and get it on average 3 times a week.

data.title: Best Lunch Special Prices Anywhere
data.text: It's a family owned business that has a rather eclectic atmosphere.  Picture of Al Pacino smoking a cigar over the top of a Buddha statue is odd and silly looking at the same time.  I have eaten lunch there several times and enjoy it when their family sits down for their lunch break as it lends a coziness to the atmosphere.  Lunch special prices are unbeatable for the amount of food you get.  I have tried several of their dishes and like all of them.  They have a drive thru and offer take out as well.  They go out of their way to prepare a special dish for folks with gluten allergies.  Nice folks.

data.title: Good food at a great price.
data.text: Mostly a take out place, but the food is well seasoned and prepared fresh.  There are a couple of tables inside, but most of their business is take out.  Good portions and cheap! Not the best chinese food in the area, but probably the most convenient if you're on the go.

data.title: Best Value - Chinese Food
data.text:
I could easily eat here twice a week (and sometimes do).  The atmosphere is lacking and I would imagine that a big portion of their business is take-out (They do have a drive-thru).
The food is great, and I actually rate their fried rice entree as the best anywhere - especially the BBQ pork or the combination (but the fried rice you get with the dinners is not the same).
Their Genral Tso's is wonderful - crunchy, sweet, spicy, and tender.  I would also recommend their Garlic Shrimp.  Most meals run around $5 - such a deal!
